item.title: Docker Commands Cheat Sheet
item.description: DOCKER Commands cheatSheet Images ðŸ’¿ Create a new image docker build -t <image_name> . Remove all unused images docker image prune -a Containers ðŸ“¦ Create a new container (not sure what is this used for) docker create Get the process status of the containers docker ps -a Works as above but is the ‘newer’ way docker container ls -a Remote a stopped container docker rm <container_name> Remove ALL old stopped containers
